languages.text: "Сейчас мы имеем одиннадцать трупов. Глаза первого были выжжены сварочным факелом, второму в лицо плеснули кислотой, третьего нашли умирающего, слоняющегося по палубе с монтажными спицами в глазницах. Он умер прежде, чем был допрошен. Остальные были убиты и изуродованы схожим способом — ослеплены. Следов убийц не обнаружено".

"Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."
languages.original_text: "Сейчас мы имеем одиннадцать трупов. Глаза первого были выжжены сварочным факелом, второму в лицо плеснули кислотой, третьего нашли умирающего, слоняющегося по палубе с монтажными спицами в глазницах. Он умер прежде, чем был допрошен. Остальные были убиты и изуродованы схожим способом — ослеплены. Следов убийц не обнаружено".

traits.locale_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around a deck, on their last legs and with cable needles sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No evidence of the killers."

They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No evidence of the killers."

They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

languages.text: 「これまでに11人の遺体が発見されています。最初の犠牲者はガストーチで目を焼かれ、二番目の犠牲者は顔に酸をかけられ、三番目の犠牲者は死にかけた状態で、眼窩から金属のピンが突き出たまま彷徨っているところを発見されました。彼らは我々が尋問する前に生命を落としました。残りの者たちも同じように目を潰され…殺されていました。犯人の身元を示す痕跡は見つかっていません」
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

traits.locale_text: 「これまでに11人の遺体が発見されています。最初の犠牲者はガストーチで目を焼かれ、二番目の犠牲者は顔に酸をかけられ、三番目の犠牲者は死にかけた状態で、眼窩から金属のピンが突き出たまま彷徨っているところを発見されました。彼らは我々が尋問する前に生命を落としました。残りの者たちも同じように目を潰され…殺されていました。犯人の身元を示す痕跡は見つかっていません」

languages.text: “到目前为止，已经有十一个人惨遭杀害。第一名受害者的眼睛被喷灯烧毁，第二名受害者的脸上被泼了酸液。第三名受害者发现的时候已经奄奄一息，眼窝里被刺入了尖针，我们还没来得及询问，那个人就死了。剩下的人也都是被类似的手段杀害，弄瞎了眼睛。我们目前并没有发现关于凶手身份的相关线索。”
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

traits.locale_text: “到目前为止，已经有十一个人惨遭杀害。第一名受害者的眼睛被喷灯烧毁，第二名受害者的脸上被泼了酸液。第三名受害者发现的时候已经奄奄一息，眼窝里被刺入了尖针，我们还没来得及询问，那个人就死了。剩下的人也都是被类似的手段杀害，弄瞎了眼睛。我们目前并没有发现关于凶手身份的相关线索。”

languages.text: « Onze cadavres ont été trouvés pour l'instant. Les yeux de la première victime ont été brûlés avec un chalumeau à gaz, la deuxième a reçu de l'acide en plein visage, la troisième a été retrouvée en train d'errer à l'agonie dans le vaisseau, avec des bouts de métal dans les orbites. Elle est morte avant que nous ne puissions l'interroger. Les autres victimes ont été tuées et défigurées de façons similaires: toutes ont été aveuglées. Nous n'avons pas trouvé le moindre indice quant à l'identité des tueurs. »
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

traits.locale_text: « Onze cadavres ont été trouvés pour l'instant. Les yeux de la première victime ont été brûlés avec un chalumeau à gaz, la deuxième a reçu de l'acide en plein visage, la troisième a été retrouvée en train d'errer à l'agonie dans le vaisseau, avec des bouts de métal dans les orbites. Elle est morte avant que nous ne puissions l'interroger. Les autres victimes ont été tuées et défigurées de façons similaires: toutes ont été aveuglées. Nous n'avons pas trouvé le moindre indice quant à l'identité des tueurs. »

languages.text: «De momento hemos encontrado once cadáveres. A la primera víctima le habían quemado los ojos con un soplete de gas. A la segunda le habían rociado la cara con ácido. La tercera apareció vagando moribunda con agujas de metal clavadas en las cuencas de sus ojos. Murió antes de que pudiéramos interrogarla. El resto también había sido mutilado de forma similar: todos habían sido cegados. No hemos encontrado rastro de la identidad de su asesino».
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

traits.locale_text: «De momento hemos encontrado once cadáveres. A la primera víctima le habían quemado los ojos con un soplete de gas. A la segunda le habían rociado la cara con ácido. La tercera apareció vagando moribunda con agujas de metal clavadas en las cuencas de sus ojos. Murió antes de que pudiéramos interrogarla. El resto también había sido mutilado de forma similar: todos habían sido cegados. No hemos encontrado rastro de la identidad de su asesino».

languages.text: "Bis jetzt wurden elf Leichen gefunden. Dem ersten Opfer waren mit einer Gasfackel die Augen ausgebrannt worden. Das zweite Opfer hatte Spuren von Säure im Gesicht, das dritte lief auf seinen letzten Beinen herum und hatte Metallnägel in seinen Augenhöhlen. Es starb, bevor wir es befragen konnten. Die anderen wurden auf ähnliche Weise getötet und verstümmelt ... mittels Blendung. Es gibt keinerlei Hinweise auf die Identität der Mörder."
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."

Das zweite Opfer hatte Spuren von Säure im Gesicht, das dritte lief auf seinen letzten Beinen herum und hatte Metallnägel in seinen Augenhöhlen. Es starb, bevor wir es befragen konnten. Die anderen wurden auf ähnliche Weise getötet und verstümmelt ... mittels Blendung. Es gibt keinerlei Hinweise auf die Identität der Mörder."

languages.text: "Şimdiye kadar on bir ceset bulundu. İlk maktulün gözleri bir gaz meşalesiyle yakılmıştı, ikincisinin yüzüne asit dökülmüştü, üçüncüsü göz yuvalarından metal iğneler çıkar hâlde, başıboş dolaşırken ve ölmek üzereyken bulundu. Onu sorgulayamadan önce öldü. Gerisi de benzer şekillerde körleştirilerek öldürüldü. Katillerin kimliğine dair herhangi bir iz bulunamadı."
languages.original_text: "Eleven bodies have been found thus far. The first victim had their eyes burned out with a gas torch, the second had acid splashed in their face, the third was found wandering around, on their last legs and with metal pins sticking out of their eye sockets. They died before we could interrogate them. The rest were killed and disfigured in similar ways — through blinding. No trace of the killers' identity was found."
